definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] 1. abundance;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Is 33:23, as adv., in abundance.

increase (?), cstr. [[לְםַרְבֵּה]] (sic) Is 9:6 for the increase of the dominion (take [[לם]] as dittogr. of foregoing, and read [[רַבָּה]], LXX Gr Che Kit Buhl:Lex Marti; Du [[לְמַרְבֵךְ]], in view of following [[לְשָׂלוֹם]]).
